title: "I'm on a trip to the moon...
body: <p>... please try to catch me if you can."</p><p><a href="http://www.flashflashrevolution.com/" title="like DDR, but with your fingers instead of your feet">Flash Flash Revolution</a> ranks right up there with <a href="http://www.bigideafun.com/penguins/arcade/spaced_penguin/default.htm" title="the quest for the spiral orbit on level 6">Kevin the Spaced Penguin</a> as far as browser-game addiction goes.  Only <acronym title="Flash Flash Revolution, duh">FFR</acronym> has music that will get stuck in your head.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-10-26

"I'm on a trip to the moon...

... please try to catch me if you can.
like DDR, but with your fingers instead of your feet
the quest for the spiral orbit on level 6
